::DeathScythe::

DeathScythe's hideous face twists into a frown as Zyber applies more salve to 
his chest. He didn't like being effected by chemicals, especially when he 
didn't know what they did.

"What is that stuff?" he asks, eyeing the salve suspicioustly.
